description: Handles authentication and session logic using Supabase.
rules: Always use `supabase.auth.getSession()` to check for user authentication.
Use `uid` from `auth.users` as the primary reference to `users` table.
OAuth callbacks should exchange the auth code for a session via `supabase.auth.exchangeCodeForSession(code)`.
Logout should clear Zustand state and call `supabase.auth.signOut()`.
